TopicTitle: AwesomeSauce Mk II [Stock] works on demo version!

Articles.Content:
Yeah, i know, Awesomesauce Mk I sucked, and no one could use it because it extensively used mods.

Well, [glow=red,2,300]NO MORE![/glow]

The Awesomesauce Mk II, as you can see by the title, is superior in just about every way, and its even faster!

This thing is so big, i cant show you pre-launch! This dosent have any ASAS, but does has RCS blocks, so this is VERY VERY hard to fly!

as in, you need to be an expert, unlike what i am most of the time with big rockets....

If youre like me, and you like to stay in your rocket until the very last moment, then this rocket is for you! if you stay in your first stage until then, the *what may as well be a spaceplane at that point* goes everywhere! If youre an expert flyer and have enough RCS left over this IS possible to fly, sort of... anyways, heres some pics ;D do note that it is a VERY bad idea to open this ship in the spacecraft building area thing, as it lags like a bitch if you have something like, say, a laptop. But if opened directly on the pad then not nearly as much lag, for some reason. Anyways, just for the record i DO NOT think that this will make a successful orbit, as that was not entirely in mind.

[stupid /img , [glow=red,2,300][shadow=red,left]WORK![/shadow][/glow]]

So, until then, i\'m going to go have some pie :3
